snippet: According to James Uleman, PhD, a psychology professor at New York University and researcher on impression management, “In spite of the congeniality of many professional gatherings, judgments are being made and impressions formed at all time...

headline.print_headline: Modern Etiquette: At Business Meetings, Impressions Are Important
headline.main: Modern Etiquette: At Business Meetings, Impressions Are Important

lead_paragraph: According to James Uleman, PhD, a psychology professor at New York University and researcher on impression management, “In spite of the congeniality of many professional gatherings, judgments are being made and impressions formed at all times.”
